users
Class StudentPreferences

java.lang.Object
  users.StudentPreferences

public class StudentPreferences
extends java.lang.Object

Provides the student's preferences of courses he wants to take and days and times he wants to attend.
Invariants:

  • none

Version:
May 27, 2011: Class created.
Author:
David

getStudentFeedback

public java.util.Collection<StudentFeedbackSummary> getStudentFeedback(Schedule the_schedule,
                                                                       java.util.Collection<DaySlot> the_dayslot_collection)
                                                                throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
For every course this student wants to take, this method returns a "feedback collection" of "dayslots" (example MW, TR) and times (day, evening) he will be on campus to take it. It doesn't return anything if he will be on campus at the scheduled day/time anyway.
Preconditions:
  • the_schedule != null
  • the collection of dayslots (MW, TR) != null
Postconditions:
  • the feedback collection != null

Parameters:
the_schedule - The schedule of courses
the_dayslot_collection - A collection of dayslots
Returns:
The collection of feedbacks
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the schedule or the dayslot collection == null
